question: Noah and Joshua have 47 minutes to walk to the library together. It takes them 7 minutes to get to the corner where the gym is. It takes them another 12 minutes to get to the school. How much longer do they have to get to library without being late?
answer:
Noah and Joshua arrive at the gym with 47 - 7 = <<47-7=40>>40 minutes left to reach the school.
They then arrive at the school and have 40 - 12 = <<40-12=28>>28 minutes left to get to library without being late.
#### 28
